overview: Join Ruby as she brings two exciting fairy tales to life! Can a princess fall in love with a frog? Find out in The Frog Prince! A young boy spends too much time joking around in the story of The Boy Who Cried Wolf!
tagline: Ruby's Storytime- The Frog Prince-The Boy Who Cried Wolf- 3D Animation
title: Ruby's Storytime Fairy Tales Vol 4.
